JOB DESCRIPTION: Job   Description      Urgently looking for a Software Developer with dedicated and passionate professional with minimum 4 years of experience in web development. Our Sr Software Developer should be well versed with all stages of Software Development.   Framework: .Net    Essential Functions & Responsibilities     Develops or modifies software products and/or customer applications using object oriented web development utilizing c#, ASP.Net, MVC, XML, JavaScript, SQL Server, HTML5, Web Services and Unit Testing.
